title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 26 2022
itunes:title: Clay Travis and Buck Sexton Show H2 – Apr 26 2022
description:
Trump-appointed judge announces he will block Biden from ending Title 42 at border. Psaki deflects responsibility for death of hero border soldier. Double vaxxed and double boosted, VP Kamala Harris tests positive for covid. The View's Sunny Hostin: "So when Elon Musk says, 'wow, this is about free speech,' seems to me that it’s about free speech of straight white men." CNBC’s Andrew Ross Sorkin: There is a real concern that we’re heading toward a recession. C&B rack their brains to name one positive accomplishment of the Biden administration. Buck gives his controversial take on the new Batman movie.

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
